text: Etiya sorgote dangor lorai hoise. Michael aru tai laga sorgodoth khan etu ajgar janwar logote lorai korise; aru etu ajgar janwar bhi tai laga duth khan ke loi kene lorai korise12.7 Michael to sorgodoth khan majot sobse dangor jon ase, aru taike Israel desh laga rakhsak eneka mate: Dan.10:21..
